item.title: How to make donater?!
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:3, topic:342596”]lol easy

if (command.startsWith("donatorzone") && donator > 0){
teleEffect = 1;
toX = "x position";
toY = "y position";
sM("Have fun in the donator zone!");
if (command.startsWith("donatorzone") && donator <= 0){
sM("You need to be a donator to enter the donator zone!");
return;
}

or you can use jake’s code and make a portal for it.[/quote]or you can use this.

if (command.startsWith("donatorzone") && donator > 0){ teleEffect = 1; toX = "x position"; toY = "y position"; sM("Have fun in the donator zone!"); } else { sM("You need to be an donator to teleport here."); }

Read full topic

item.title: How to make donater?!
item.dc:creator: @ameer122 ameer122
item.description:
@ameer122 wrote:

[quote="!Jake Whip!, post:2, topic:342596"]You can make a portal that only donators can use here:

if (objectID == 4157) { teleEffect = 1; if(donator == 1) triggerTele(XXXX, XXXX, 0); sM("Welcome To SERVERNAME's Donator Area!"); sM("You have to Be a Donor to use this portal.."); }[/quote]

where to add this?

item.title: How to make donater?!
item.dc:creator: @_Jake_Whip !Jake Whip!
item.description:
@_Jake_Whip wrote:

You can make a portal that only donators can use here:

if (objectID == 4157) { teleEffect = 1; if(donator == 1) triggerTele(XXXX, XXXX, 0); sM("Welcome To SERVERNAME's Donator Area!"); sM("You have to Be a Donor to use this portal.."); }
